Analyse receipt allows you to take a photo of a receipt and the application will extract the product name and the price from the receipt.

Saved results can be loaded from the Load Save File page.

Data can be manually entered using the Manual Entry page.

You can view results submitted through the View Results viewer.
Enter the name of the product into the product text box.\n\nEnter the corresponding price of the product and press the Add Item button.

Replace the text in the product and/or price text boxes with the edited version and click the Save button.

The item can be deleted by pressing the Delete button.

Empty results can be caused by a number of things.

Ensure that you are taking a photo in a well lit area and make sure the receipt is as clear as possible.

If you still have no success, you enter the data from the receipt manual by clicking on the Manual Entry button on the homepage.
A failed upload occurs when an error message is returned from the server.\n\nThis normally occurs when there is poor network availability or when the target server is down.
Previously saved results can be loaded by selecting the appropiate save file.\n\nSave files can be deleted by pressing the menu button on your device and selecting Edit
Select an entry to delete the save file.

Enter the location of the store where the receipt is from in the location field.

If applicable, your current location can be obtained using GPS by clicking on the search icon beside the location field.

When the form is filled out, you should click the Share button and your results will be uploaded to our server.
By default, the camera options are set to the most optimal settings.\n\nIf needed, you can manually change these options here.

The items displayed here are what will be uploaded to the server when you click share.

They can be edited or deleted by selecting an item.

New items can be added to the list by pressing the Add Item button.
Align the receipt in the viewer and press the Take Photo button.\n\nDepending on the focus option selected, the photo will only be taken if correctly focused.
